channel.title: Meta on Hugo Tailwind
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Hugo Tailwind

item.title: Valorant: Agent Balance Patch 8.0
item.description: Major balance changes shake up the Valorant meta with significant agent adjustments.

item.title: Fortnite: New Mythic Weapon Arrives
item.description: Epic Games introduces a powerful new mythic weapon that’s changing the meta.

item.title: Ranked Season 12: Meta Analysis and Top Picks
item.description: The new patch has shaken up the leaderboard. Here are the legends and loadouts you need to be running to hit Predator this season.

item.title: Apex Legends Season 20: Breakout Brings Major Changes
item.description: Respawn Entertainment shakes up the meta with legend reworks, a new weapon, and significant map changes to Kings Canyon.

item.title: Apex Legends Meta Shift: New Tier List Revealed
item.description: Professional players reveal the current meta tier list with surprising changes in S-tier rankings.

item.title: Valorant Agent 25: Chronomancer Revealed
item.description: Riot Games introduces the 25th agent with time manipulation abilities that change the meta completely.

item.title: Overwatch 2: Hero 42 'Nexus' Breaks the Meta
item.description: Blizzard introduces Nexus, a reality-bending support hero that changes how teams approach team composition.
